            <entry>cahi1:data_5de115228a7d01532668578fe9e277f40f1481cd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sharing of charges between two capacitors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teilen der Ladungen zwischen zwei Kondensatoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partage des frais entre deux condensateurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compartilhar das cargas entre dois capacitores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Compartecipazione delle spese fra due 
condensatori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή των δαπανών μεταξύ δύο πυκνωτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El compartir de cargas entre dos condensadores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when a charged capacitor  is to be connected in parallel with an uncharged capacitor, the charge stored will be shared between the two capacitors.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capacitors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential difference</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn ein belasteter 
Kondensator parallel zu einem uncharged Kondensator angeschlossen 
werden soll, die gespeicherte worden Ladung zwischen den zwei 
Kondensatoren geteilt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand un 
condensateur chargé doit être relié parallèlement à un 
condensateur uncharged, la charge enregistrée sera partagée entre 
les deux condensateurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando um 
capacitor carregado deve ser conectado na paralela com um capacitor 
uncharged, a carga armazenada estará compartilhada entre os dois 
capacitores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando un 
condensatore caricato deve essere collegato in parallelo con un 
condensatore uncharged, la carica memorizzata sarà ripartita fra i 
due condensatori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν ένας 
χρεωμένος πυκνωτής πρόκειται να συνδεθεί παράλληλα με ο 
πυκνωτής, η δαπάνη που καταχωρείται θα μοιραστεί μεταξύ των δύο 
πυκνωτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando un 
condensador cargado debe ser conectado en paralelo con un condensador 
uncharged, la carga salvada será compartida entre los dos 
condensadores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
